text: bhumiyehi (vinasa vi giya) pera visu ayagen pasu, eya ayiti kara gat movunvada api adahas kalemu nam, movunge papayanhi hetuven (e akarayenma vinasa kara) danduvam karannemu yana karanava movunta rju margaya penvuve nædda? api movunge hrdayan mata mudra taba hæriyemu. ebævin movun (honda ovadan valata) savan nodennaha
